trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Altoona
There was one other sighting in Altoona on or around June 23rd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details1. taking pictures of "weird" cloud formations and lights in the night sky. 2. the witness was downloading digital pictures into her laptop & saw the vortexes. 3. vortexes. 4. the vortexes were hovering in the sky. 5. the witness had feelings of elation and obsession with watching the night sky due to several encounters\observations of "weird" clouds & lights plus black helicopters in the area. 6. the objects just moved away.
Summary: 3 Vortexes appeared in the sky while witness was observing "weird" cloud formations and lights in the sky.
